data.text: @rajtoday @mid_day I am traveling by 12314 New Delhi Sealdah Rajdhani. No blanket/ linen provided. I didn't carry those as I assumed that the same will be provided by #indianrailway
@rajtoday @mid_day Traveling today in 11005 hope i wil get blankets in 3tier AC
@RailwaySeva @Avinash83803675 Sir, Matter forwarded to Sr. CDO/GKP for n/a

@Khurshedswami @rajtoday @mid_day Just because of the lack of civil sense , it's not correct to not introduce this amenities, these should be present to add charm to the railways...strict measures should be taken and properly executed to avoid such thefts!!!
@Avinash83803675 For necessary action escalated to the concerned official @Drmljn
@rajtoday @mid_day We are in train 15017 from Ltt GKP exp. and blankets , linens are not provided by staff @irctc @Central_Railway @RailMinIndia
@rajtoday @mid_day Its not with immediate effect, we are in train 20943 from Bandra , blankets linens are not available @westernrly @railwayseva @railminindia

@rajtoday @mid_day Can a passenger board a train with waitlist “window ticket” . Heard they have made it only for confirmed one to board the train. 

What’s the status now @IRCTCofficial @RailMinIndia @AshwiniVaishnaw ?
